    • Content

      /* FixCouponCodes.do */
/** This file turns Jeremiah Hair's coupon codes into the partner's format 
@author Allcott and Taubinsky
*/


** Coupon codes were missing a leading 1 (if less than 700) and included a trailing 9. Modify this.
gen CouponCode=OrigCouponCode
replace CouponCode=(CouponCode-9)/10
replace CouponCode = CouponCode + 1000 if CouponCode<700


** Several coupon codes were entered in a different format
foreach c in 838 1052 1065 1066 {
	replace CouponCode = `c' if OrigCouponCode==`c'
}

        FixCouponCodes   FixCouponCodes do
